title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Cognitive Load Measurement and Optimization in Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: One can utilize scientific tools to measure learners' cognitive load (intrinsic/extraneous/germane load) in PBL environments
One can propose optimization strategies for PBL activity design based on measurement results
One can apply cognitive load theory when developing PBL scenarios specialized for social studies domains
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
